15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20#include <stddef.h> /* NULL */
21#include <stdlib.h> /* NULL */
22#include <syslog.h>
23
24#include <sys/time.h>
25
26#include <isc/stdtime.h>
27#include <isc/util.h>
28
29#ifndef ISC_FIX_TV_USEC
30#define ISC_FIX_TV_USEC 1
31#endif
32
33#define US_PER_S 1000000
34
35#if ISC_FIX_TV_USEC
36static inline void
37fix_tv_usec(struct timeval *tv) {
38 bool fixed = false;
39
40 if (tv->tv_usec < 0) {
41 fixed = true;
42 do {
43 tv->tv_sec -= 1;
44 tv->tv_usec += US_PER_S;
45 } while (tv->tv_usec < 0);
46 } else if (tv->tv_usec >= US_PER_S) {
47 fixed = true;
48 do {
49 tv->tv_sec += 1;
50 tv->tv_usec -= US_PER_S;
51 } while (tv->tv_usec >=US_PER_S);
52 }
53 /*
54 * Call syslog directly as we are called from the logging functions.
55 */
56 if (fixed)
57 (void)syslog(LOG_ERR, "gettimeofday returned bad tv_usec: corrected");
58}
59#endif
60
61void
62isc_stdtime_get(isc_stdtime_t *t) {
63 struct timeval tv;
64
65 /*
66 * Set 't' to the number of seconds since 00:00:00 UTC, January 1,
67 * 1970.
68 */
69
70 REQUIRE(t != NULL);
71
72 RUNTIME_CHECK(gettimeofday(&tv, NULL) != -1);
73
74#if ISC_FIX_TV_USEC
75 fix_tv_usec(&tv);
76 INSIST(tv.tv_usec >= 0);
77#else
78 INSIST(tv.tv_usec >= 0 && tv.tv_usec < US_PER_S);
79#endif
80
81 *t = (unsigned int)tv.tv_sec;
82}
83
